text: Reminder: Welcome to our developer community. If someone helps you out by answering a question. please pay it forward by helping someone else out in the community - when you know an answer. Ask questions in the relevant channels, our community is very active and will see it. We have a chatbot that can answer commonly asked questions, feel free to reach out to it by DMing `@DevHelp`

Hi all, newcomer here who has done development in the Google Ads, Bing Ads, and FB ads APIs. I am trying to pull in original source metrics from the Deals API but for some reason the following fields aren't coming through: 'hs_analytics_source','hs_analytics_source_data_1','hs_analytics_source_data_2'. Would love to hear any suggestions from fellow developers
Hi everyone, my name is Binh. I am a developer and very new to HubSpot. Really excited to join the community. All the best!!
